newsitem.title: ESTONIA: Estonian bourse eases after sluggish session.
newsitem.headline: Estonian bourse eases after sluggish session.

text.p: Trading was sluggish at Estonia's bourse on Friday and the index fell slightly, dealers said.
Overall market volume was 4.3 million kroons compared with 10.9 million kroons on Thursday and the index fell 0.07 percent to 105.76.
Market leader Hansa Bank accounted for the lion's share of activity at 2.9 million kroons and its price closed unchanged at 107.25 kroons.
